sentences.english: This paper studies the primary bronchogenic carcinoma pathogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究原发性支气管肺癌的病因病机。

sentences.english: It is well-known that lung cancer is caused at least in part by smoking too much.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: It is well-known that cancer at least partly caused by over smoking.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，肺癌至少部分地是由于吸烟过多引起的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the misdiagnosis causes and the early diagnosis of primary bronchogenic carcinoma(PBC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性支气管肺癌的误诊原因及早期诊断。

sentences.english: Kangai Baojin Decoction had proved to be the role of reliving toxicity and adding efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 证明抗癌保金方在肺癌化疗中确有减毒增效的作用。

sentences.english: More cold quantity company more badly situation in Lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌病性越偏于寒者，其一般状态越差。

sentences.english: A good Chinese article about Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer treatment.
sentences.chinese: 非小细胞肺癌怎么治疗？

sentences.english: Lung cancer and malignant mesothelioma are more common with asbestos inhalation and asbestosis.
sentences.chinese: 肺癌和恶性间皮瘤亦和石绵吸入及石绵沉着病有关。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical and pathological characteristics of choroidal metastatic carcinoma from lung carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肺癌脉络膜转移的临床及病理组织学特征。

sentences.english: There is no question about it; smoking is well-associated with lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟与肺癌高度相关，这是毫无疑问的。

sentences.english: Gemcitabine is a new active drug in the treatment of advanced non small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).
sentences.chinese: 吉西他滨是近年来治疗晚期非小细胞肺癌的有效新药。

sentences.english: In short, there is more to the equation than simply smoking and lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 简言之，仅仅吸烟与得肺癌之间是不能简单划等号的。

sentences.english: Certain occupations can raise the risk of lung cancer in both smokers and nonsmokers.
sentences.chinese: 一些职业会增加得肺癌的风险。

sentences.english: They are intermediate hosts of lung flukes.
sentences.chinese: 他们为肺癌吸虫的中间宿主。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of craniotomy to treat the cerebral metastasis from lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨开颅手术对肺癌脑转移治疗价值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of video-assisted thoracoscope surgery in lung cancer treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨电视胸腔镜手术在肺癌治疗中的临床价值。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
